description:
~ New iOS style emojis updated
1.- New base 2.25.17.80 updated
2.- Added Blur effect on main screen and conversation
3.- Notifications now arrive in real time without delay.
4.- Now you can receive alerts when your contacts delete a message or status
5.- After each call you will receive a notification with additional information.
6.- You can now filter notification preferences by name
7.- Notification preferences can now be read aloud
8.- Added 2 additional icons: Dark icon, Glass icon
9.- Now you can create icons (shortcuts) into any color you want.
10.- Pin more than 3 chats
11.- Show last connection on the main screen
